description: Host Utilization per hour comparing the last 48 hours day over day, with 9am-5pm highlighted

targets.rawSql:
SELECT current_vals.time as "time",
       current_avg as "Today",
       offset_avg as "Yesterday"
FROM
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time) as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS current_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'MEM' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
      ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as current_vals
JOIN
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time + INTERVAL '24 HOUR') as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS offset_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'MEM' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND ($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND
      ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR',$__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as offset_vals
ON offset_vals.time = current_vals.time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT current_vals.time as "time",
       current_avg as "Today",
       offset_avg as "Yesterday"
FROM
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time) as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS current_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'CPU' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
      ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as current_vals
JOIN
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time + INTERVAL '24 HOUR') as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS offset_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'CPU' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND ($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND
      ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR',$__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as offset_vals
ON offset_vals.time = current_vals.time
ORDER BY 1

       offset_avg as "Yesterday"
FROM
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time) as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS current_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'SWAPPING' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
      ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as current_vals
JOIN
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time + INTERVAL '24 HOUR') as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS offset_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'SWAPPING' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND ($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND
      ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR',$__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as offset_vals
ON offset_vals.time = current_vals.time
ORDER BY 1

SELECT current_vals.time as "time",
       current_avg as "Today",
       offset_avg as "Yesterday"
FROM
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time) as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS current_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'BALLOONING' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
      ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
    GROUP BY 1) as current_vals
JOIN
    (SELECT
      date_trunc('hour', m.time + INTERVAL '24 HOUR') as "time",
      avg(m.utilization) AS offset_avg
    FROM entity e
    JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid AND
      m.entity_hash = e.hash AND
      m.type = 'BALLOONING' AND
      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND
      m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND ($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') AND
      ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR',$__timeTo()::TIMESTAMP - interval '24 HOUR') OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) AND
      CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END

ON offset_vals.time = current_vals.time

       offset_avg as "Yesterday"

    (SELECT

      e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'  AND

list.definition:
select name as __text, 
       oid as __value 
from entity 
where entity.type = 'GROUP' 
and ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
and $__timeTo() >= first_seen 
group by name, oid 
order by 1
list.name: Group
list.query:
select name as __text, 
       oid as __value 
from entity 
where entity.type = 'GROUP' 
and ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) 
and $__timeTo() >= first_seen 
group by name, oid 
order by 1

title: Utilization Day over Day Hourly
